sections.title: PMID Settings
text: BASE_PMID_URL: is a variable which set the link that is used to add to each PubMedID the pubmed article associated with it.

sections.title: Paths Settings
text: You can use both Windows ('\') and UNIX ('/') positioning, but beware that UNIX works on any OS while the windows one does not.
DOCS_PATH: is a variable which set the relative path where the json documentation files are stored.
GENE_TABLE_PATH: is a variable which set the relative path of the GeneTable file.
DISEASE_TABLE_PATH: is a variable which set the relative path of the GeneTable file.

sections.title: Cache Settings
text: Here are settings used by flask-caching to store the tables and download them later.
CACHE_CONFIG: is a dictionary containing some options for the cache.
